title: 150 years old ANTIQUE HOUSE for sale- Talpe.
details:
This house was old more than 150 years.
It's situated at Talpe, just 50 meter behind the beach. ( beach access available )
The beach is nice to bathin
The house is situated at land side
Tourist attract area
Seven rooms/ soldaraya/ court yard
Just I front of the main road and just behind the railway station of Talpe

NB:
House inspection only with our real estate agent Miss. Ramya Jayasekera on 0778680820
